name: Snowy Grave
description:
This is my very first game ever and I am so excited to share it with Y'all.

This game takes place during the winter in the state of Wyoming.

Hopefully, this will be the first part of many games. 

Thank you for playing and please consider donating. 

Also, subscribe to my youtube channel and follow me on Twitter 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCK7eyt_pKqLsURt1BoeV0VA

https://twitter.com/askewkeyboard
